author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Cute Angel!
review: I got this set in my local department store 70% off. This set is very cute & adorable, easy to build, and very beautiful wings, which shaped like a butterfly. What's more, this set is a limited edition. Better hurry if there's still one in your local toy store!

author: alva
title: Good Set on Discount
review:
I found this set along with the 10070 reindeer on a really big discount a couple years ago.
The same with the reindeer, this set is also shows a simple yet nice design.
Love the way Lego use the round with hole plate as the angel halo in the set.
You can use this set along with other christmas/winter sets (e.g. the winter toy store or the winter bakery) to create a more complete christmas feeling, with this set act as snow statue.

Really merry merry christmas on the world of Lego.

You should buy one if you happens to stumble on them.
